stentry.p: The date that the adverse event, product problem, or product use error occurred. Medwatch 3500 form question B.3; Medwatch 3500A form question B.3; Medwatch 3500B form question A.3.
(Placeholder: Modeling is still in progress on this element)
Did the Intial Reporter also send a report to the FDA? Medwatch 3500A form question E.4.
